about.title: Capital invest group
about.description:
CAPITAL INVEST GROUP работает в сфере управления недвижимостью и бизнесом.
  в 4 областях РА (Ереван, Тавуш, Арарат, Котайк)

items.buildings: Создание, анализ и реализация инвестиционных планов

tsaghkadzor.title: Tsaghkadzor hills aparts and villas
tsaghkadzor.desc: Tsaghkadzor Hills is A  multifunctional residential complex, composed of 2 multifunctional buildings, 60 private houses, 3 three-story multifunctional buildings and 4 four-story multifunctional buildings.
tsaghkadzor.about: Outdoor and indoor swimming pools,  Gym, Playground, Cafes, Banquet hall and number of other entertainment and luxury sites.
tsaghkadzor.address: Our address: RA, Gegharkunik Marz, Tsaghkadzor, Saralanji 1.

dilijan.title: dILIJAN HILLS
dilijan.desc: DILIJAN HILLS residential area offers two storey  detached houses. You can buy the apartments both  with renovated  kitchen furniture and without. Total area: 220-292 square meters
dilijan.about: 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, balcony, mansion area: 115 square meters, private land, private parking.
dilijan.address: Our address: RA, Tavush Marz, Dilijan, Shahumyan str. 17b:
